name: Gnomers
description:
Save the garden ornaments from plummeting to their doom. GAMEPLAY

1. Help the garden gnomes get home safely.

2. Don't let them drop from too high.

3. They can survive one small drop... but only one!

Remember, they are very brittle.

CONTROLS
  • Drag and drop with the mouse
  • Move the gnomes to safety.
  • Place pillows for them to land on.

A very short experience 😉
